actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for reinstatement of optional insurance coverage under the Federal employees group life insurance program for certain individuals who canceled optional insurance due to an increase in premiums because of age which was set at a lower amount later in the year of cancellation.

summary.text: Provides for reinstatement of optional insurance coverage under the Federal Employees Group Life Insurance Program for individuals who cancelled optional insurance due to an increase in premiums because of age which was set at a lower amount later in the year of cancellation.

titles.title: A bill to provide for reinstatement of optional insurance coverage under the Federal employees group life insurance program for certain individuals who canceled optional insurance due to an increase in premiums because of age which was set at a lower amount later in the year of cancellation.
